verses.verse: וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מֵֽעַרְבֹ֤ת <S%H6160><s%> from the plains מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto the mountain נְב֔וֹ <S%H5015><s%> of Nebo רֹ֚אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֔ה <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] over against יְרֵח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> Jericho וַיַּרְאֵ֨הוּ <S%H7200><s%> shewed יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> him all the land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far דָּֽן׃ <S%H1835><s%> unto Dan

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> And all Naphtali וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and all the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> unto the utmost

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֶּ֗גֶב <S%H5045><s%> And the south וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּכָּ֞ר <S%H3603><s%> and the plain בִּקְעַ֧ת <S%H1237><s%> of the valley יְרֵח֛וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> the city הַתְּמָרִ֖ים <S%H8558><s%> of palm עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far צֹֽעַר׃ <S%H6820><s%> unto Zoar

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> unto him This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> and unto Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> it unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <S%H5414><s%> I will give הֶרְאִיתִ֣יךָ <S%H7200><s%> I have caused thee to see בְעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> [it] with thine eyes וְשָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲבֹֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> but thou shalt not go over

וַיָּ֨מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> there מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> So Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> there in the land מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ר <S%H6912><s%> And he buried אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> בַגַּיְ֙ <S%H1516><s%> him in a valley בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מ֖וּל <S%H4136><s%> over against בֵּ֣ית פְּע֑וֹר <S%H1047><s%> Bethpeor וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> but no man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְבֻ֣רָת֔וֹ <S%H6900><s%> of his sepulchre עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מֵאָ֧ה <S%H3967><s%> [was] an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּמֹת֑וֹ <S%H4194><s%> when he died לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor כָהֲתָ֥ה <S%H3543><s%> was not dim עֵינ֖וֹ <S%H5869><s%> his eye וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> abated לֵחֹֽה׃ <S%H3893><s%> nor his natural force

וַיִּבְכּוּ֩ <S%H1058><s%> wept בְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> for Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֥ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וַֽיִּתְּמ֔וּ <S%H8552><s%> were ended יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> so the days בְכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> of weeping אֵ֥בֶל <S%H60><s%> [and] mourning מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> for Moses

וִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֗וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun מָלֵא֙ <S%H4392><s%> was full ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of the spirit חָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סָמַ֥ךְ <S%H5564><s%> had laid מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> for Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַיִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> on בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> upon him and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto him and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no קָ֨ם <S%H6965><s%> And there arose נָבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> not a prophet ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> since בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel כְּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> like unto Moses אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom יְדָע֣וֹ <S%H3045><s%> knew יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> to face

לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָ֨אֹת֜וֹת <S%H226><s%> In all the signs וְהַמּוֹפְתִ֗ים <S%H4159><s%> and the wonders אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which שְׁלָחוֹ֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> him to do בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> and to all his servants וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> and to all his land

וּלְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and for all הַיָּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> And in all that mighty וּלְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and for all הַמּוֹרָ֣א <S%H4172><s%> terror הַגָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and in all the great אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shewed מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel
